name: The Corridor (Al-exe)
description:
How to distinguish reality from fiction? How to wake up from a nightmare, in which the most terrible fantasies come to life? There is only one solution - to move forward, not looking back. You do not want to know what you breathe in the back ...

The game takes place in the hotel, which has recently stopped protagonist. Waking up at night from the sense of unexplained anxiety, it comes out of his room and finds himself in a dark long corridor. At night, the hotel has changed beyond recognition, becoming one endless maze of crushing walls. To get out of it, the hero will have to face your fear, going further into the shadowy darkness.
